segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it’s just getting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate that she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are too busy with the cookies to care about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the floor is slippery enough to cause a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is in such a precarious position—it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this whole scene is about to go wrong in so many ways.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope someone notices before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
